name: Hexcross (itch)
description:
Avoid getting hexed in this beautiful puzzle dueler.
Players take turns creating lines trying to avoid certain demise.
Make a triangle and you're out!

* Challenge your friends in custom battles!
* Foot tappin' funky fresh tracks to enjoy and unlock.
* levels to challenge your wits and dexterity, or lack there of.
* beautiful boards to exchange blows on during your bouts.

With love and fun from your new friends at MetaHobby.
developers: M E T A H O B B Y
